title: Computer using Intel HD not Radeon 2GB card :((((((
body: I'm pretty sure my new laptop is not utilising the inbuilt Radeon 2GB M370 but is instead using the integrated Intel HD GPU. I have 8GB RAM and i7 core, surely this coupled with a 2GB card would be enough to run 120FPS on max graphics instead of 17-25FPS. I turn the settings down to min and its still only hitting 90-100 FPS. Before anyone suggests driver update etc I've done all that including deleting and reinstalling fresh drivers, downloading AMD catalyst controller and changing power play options/switchable graphics options to maximise performance. Has anyone encountered this issue? If so I would really appreciate some help!

replies.body: It sounds to me like your laptop might have a power setting that's not providing enough power to get the ball rolling.  I suggest going over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to fix this up, starting with the power options section.  This should fix you up!
If anyone thinks maybe something else could be causing the FPS to drop please share
